mobile.name: cloaked figure
mobile.act: npc dont_wander no_tame stay_area mage nopurge update_always
mobile.part: head arms legs heart brains guts hands feet fingers ear eye

object.name: riddle

extradesc.desc:
A piece of vellum paper which has a riddle written upon it.
"Upon stone and brick, You will find my trick. Where they learn, they teach and preach. My lost treasure, is hidden in good measure. 270 Degrees Clockwise, will be my demise. Hidden in the tower, you find my power."

object.short: parchment with a riddle on it.

extradesc.desc: This jade-crystal hangs on a long, brass chain. It is meant to hang around the neck, to protect the wearer from the enemy...whoever that may be.

object.name: a tall, wooden desk with a bench affixed to the back east
object.desc: A tall, wooden desk with a bench affixed to it lines the eastern wall.

object.name: a tall, wooden desk with a bench affixed to the back west
object.desc: A tall, wooden desk with a bench affixed to it lines the western wall.

room.name: Inside the Doors
room.desc: Beyond the ominous doors is a great cavern, its floor beset with marble and inlaid designs. A near brown marble square is amidst the remaining white stone. Within the square is a design depicting a small, bony hand with long fingernails taking a gold coin from a pale human hand. The pattern of designs continues up the chamber, the squares lined on both sides with tall desks with contrasting Goblins sitting behind them, busy at work. Hanging bove from the cavern walls is a curvy golden chandelier with buzzing, fuzzy lights illuminating the room. Small breaks in the desks reveal passages leading off to small doors in the walls.

room.name: Middle of the Large Chamber
room.desc: Here the central chamber of Gringotts continues. A large, golden chandelier is reflected in the highly polished, white-marble floors. A large mural on the floor and walls depicts large gems being weighed. On the east and west sides are tall desks with gaps on either side. The gaps show dark passages leading down under the building. The passages wind and twist away into darkness. To the north is more of the large chamber, and the space between the doors is to the south.

room.name: Middle of the Large Chamber
room.desc: Light from the golden chandelier above gleams brightly on the white marble of the floor and walls. The warm glow illuminates an intricate mural in the marble. It shows a large pile of galleons glimmering in their open vault. Shining gold bits embedded in the floor add to the shimmering effect. Tall, long wooden desks to the east and west line most of the wall, save for gaps where dark passages are visible. To the north is the desk of the head goblin, and to the south is more of the large chamber.

roomecho.desc: A small child, walking with her mother, reaches down in wonder to touch the gleaming gold in the floor.

room.name: Desk of the Head Goblin
room.desc: As the marble floor ends here it meets with the ornately carved desk of the Head Goblin. The warm wood is encrusted with enormous jewels that gleam in the light of the golden chandelier above. The gems form intricate patterns showing many dangerous beasts guarding piles of gold. The desk is very tall, much higher than the desks along the rest of the chamber. The top is covered with scales, keys, and papers piled up in an orderly fashion. Tunnels branch off from here to the east, west, northeast, and northwest. To the south is the middle of the large chamber.

extradesc.desc: Gleaming jewels encrusted in the desk show scenes of dangerous beasts guarding treasure. In one scene a large dragon breathes fire at an unlucky intruder, while observing goblins cackle gleefully.

room.name: Goblin Vault
room.desc: This small room is a perfect cube. Rough grey stone creates all of the surfaces in this vault. Though it is not particularly long or wide, the vault is very deep and could hold quite a lot. Rough steps of the same grey stones lead upwards to the elaborately locked trapdoor. An intricate framework of magical locking devices glitters from the trapdoor, sealing it to those both inside and out. The trapdoor, in the ceiling, is the only way out.

room.name: FIRST DRAFT Stairway to Vaults
room.desc: The white marble no longer decorates the walls and floor in this recess in the wall. Instead a rough, greyish stone forms the ceiling, floor and walls. A single, flickering torch provides light, as the chandeliers in the large chamber cannot reach far into these shady alcoves. A narrow stone staircase leads downwards from here, to the lower floors of Gringotts. To the east is the main lobby.

room.name: FIRST DRAFT Staircase to Vaults
room.desc: The white marble no longer decorates the walls and floor in this recess in the wall. Instead a rough, greyish stone forms the ceiling, floor and walls. A single, flickering torch provides light, as the chandeliers in the large chamber cannot reach far into these shady alcoves. A narrow stone staircase leads downwards from here, to the lower floors of Gringotts. To the east is the main lobby.

roomecho.desc: A goblin strides past, leading someone to their vault.
A goblin appears from the staircase, leading someone back to the lobby.

room.name: FIRST DRAFT Passage
room.desc: Rough grey stone creates a tight passage beneath the lobby of Gringotts. The stone is slicked down by years of mould and mildew, due to water trickling down through cracks and breaks in the rock. The floor is covered with layers of dirt from countless feet passing through this small place. This intersection goes off to the north, south, east, and west, the floor slanting ever so slightly as it does so.

room.name: FIRST DRAFT Mountain Troll Break Room
room.desc: This vast, stone room is quite strangely shaped. One of the walls is angled, so that a rock face, angled at about forty-five degrees, rises towards the ceiling. A large cave is hollowed out at the base of the wall. It appears dark, and it is hard to tell how far it reaches. In the flat section of the floor, short conifers have managed to take root in small cracks. There is a pile of uprooted trees in the corner, those who were not so lucky. Up above, the ceiling is far, far, off. The air is rather thin here. To east one can exit, and to the west is the cave.

extradesc.desc: These scraggly conifers just survive here. Some less fortunate trees lie heaped together.

room.name: Crup Break Room
room.desc: This entire room appears to have been gnawed upon. The wooden table, the leashes upon that table, even the lamps affixed to the wall all have small bite-marks in them. Cushions and beds, about the right size for a small dog, have been placed on the floor in no visible pattern. They are quite patched and worn, varying in colour and size. More leashes and collars are hung upon the wall, placed on sharp spikes jutting out at odd angles. The whole room seems to have been put together hastily and without much thought. The scratched-up door to the west leads to one of the many passages of Gringotts.

extradesc.desc: Small dog beds have been placed haphazardly about the room. They are quite patched and worn, and in a multitude of different colours and patterns. A particularly chewed-upon bed is squished up in the corner. Bits of stuffing poke out of the seams.

roomecho.desc: A squat goblin deposits several leashes upon the table before exiting.

room.name: FIRST DRAFT River Troll Break Room
room.desc: A heavy mist hangs in the air here. The source can be found by the far wall, where a small river runs past and then disappears beneath the stone floor. A soft trickling sound can be heard as the clear, crisp water passes through rounded rocks in the riverbed. Nearby, a weeping willow leans over the water, its roots raised from the layer of dirt on the floor. The branches droop mournfully, dipping their tips into the water below. Small boulders are strewn across the rest of the ground, many flat on top. Some rocks near the water are covered in a thick carpet of moss. This moss continues on right up to the door to the west.

roomecho.desc: A plopping sound can be heard as a frog leaps into the river.

room.name: SECOND DRAFT Forest Troll Break Room
room.desc: This large room seems to have been modelled after the trolls' natural territory. It is almost as if a small forest was uprooted and placed in the rough stone chamber. Towering evergreens and shade-giving maples brush their tops against the distant ceiling, while pale, lilac flowers creep across the mossy ground. Dead leaves crunch underfoot, creating a brittle carpet. Cool mist hangs in the air, making the forest all the more realistic. Through the door to the south one can find another Gringotts passage.

extradesc.desc: Fragile, pale-lilac flowers creep across the ground, reaching out with wispy tendrils to the bases of trees and rocks. Fragile leaves unfurl themselves from the vine, so that their pointed tips brush against the ground.

roomecho.desc: A bird calls mournfully from the top of a particularly tall tree.

room.name: Passage
room.desc: Made of stone, this narrow tunnel hosts dancing and jumping shadows playing from the torches set upon the wall. Though the torches are flaming, the air is cold and crisp. Upon the floor are diminutive rails heading steeply toward the tunnels below or upwards to the tun. A dragon's lair lies to the east and west.

room.name: Passage
room.desc: Made of stone, this narrow tunnel hosts dancing and jumping shadows playing from the torches set upon the wall. Though the torches are flaming, the air is cold and crisp. Upon the floor are diminutive rails leading up to the higher tunnels or north and south vaults. Lining this corridor are small doors with minute silver locks and tiny silver numbers upon them. The door to the east is vault 272 and to the west, vault 273.

roomecho.desc: An ember pops from one of the torches and disintegrates before it strikes the ground.

room.name: Passage
room.desc: Made of stone, this narrow tunnel hosts dancing and jumping shadows playing from the torches set upon the wall. Though the torches are flaming, the air is cold and crisp. Upon the floor are diminutive rails leading north and south. Lining this corridor are small doors with minute silver locks and tiny silver numbers upon them. The door to the east is vault 274 and to the west, vault 275.

roomecho.desc: An ember pops from one of the torches and disintegrates before it strikes the ground.

room.name: Passage
room.desc: Made of stone, this narrow tunnel hosts dancing and jumping shadows playing from the torches set upon the wall. Though the torches are flaming, the air is cold and crisp. Upon the floor are diminutive rails leading north and south. Lining this corridor are small doors with minute silver locks and tiny silver numbers upon them. The door to the east is vault 276 and to the west, vault 277.

roomecho.desc: An ember pops from one of the torches and disintegrates before it strikes the ground.

room.name: Passage
room.desc: Made of stone, this narrow tunnel hosts dancing and jumping shadows playing from the torches set upon the wall. Though the torches are flaming, the air is cold and crisp. Upon the floor are diminutive rails leading north and south. Lining this corridor are small doors with minute silver locks and tiny silver numbers upon them. The door to the east is vault 278 and to the west, vault 279.

roomecho.desc: An ember pops from one of the torches and disintegrates before it strikes the ground.

room.name: Passage Drop
room.desc: . Made of stone, this narrow tunnel hosts dancing and jumping shadows playing from the torches set upon the wall. Though the torches are flaming, the air is cold and crisp. Upon the floor are diminutive rails dropping steeply toward the tunnels below, or leading upward to the main level, or heading eastward to the vaults on this level.

room.name: Passage to the Tunnels
room.desc: . Made of stone, this narrow tunnel hosts dancing and jumping shadows playing from the torches set upon the wall. Though the torches are flaming, the air is cold and crisp. Upon the floor are diminutive rails dropping steeply toward the tunnels below. One must head east to reach the main hallway or down for the tunnels.

room.name: Tunnel
room.desc: . Made of stone, this narrow tunnel hosts dancing and jumping shadows playing from the torches set upon the wall. Though the torches are flaming, the air is cold and crisp. Upon the floor are diminutive rails heading eastward to the vaults on this level or upward toward the main floor.

room.name: Passage
room.desc: Made of stone, this narrow tunnel hosts dancing and jumping shadows playing from the torches set upon the wall. Though the torches are flaming, the air is cold and crisp. Upon the floor are diminutive rails leading north and south. Lining this corridor are small doors with minute silver locks and tiny silver numbers upon them. The door to the east is vault 280 and to the west, vault 281.

roomecho.desc: An ember pops from one of the torches and disintegrates before it strikes the ground.
